an9.25:4.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti, tassetaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallaṃ vacanāya:
an9.25:4.2: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
an9.25:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti?
an9.25:5.2: ‘Vītarāgaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.3: ‘vītadosaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.4: ‘vītamohaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.5: ‘asarāgadhammaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.6: ‘asadosadhammaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.7: ‘asamohadhammaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.8: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ kāmabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.9: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ rūpabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.25:5.10: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ arūpabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti.
an9.25:5.11: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti, tassetaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallaṃ vacanāya:
an9.25:5.12: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’”ti.
